channel.title: Golden age of RuneScape
channel.description:
Why Delta? I was anti Delta for a while, and tried using multiple bases, but they all just didn't suit what I wanted. Delta needs work for sure, and I'm willing to do it.
My goal of this server is to do my best to bring back the golden age of RS.
No Godswords, no Dark Bows, no Dragon Claws, nothing.
[b]This will not be 100% perfect, this is to the best of my ability, if you would like to help anyway, adding any features you feel it needs, feel free to ask.[/b]
Goals:
Perfect teleporting
Better skill bases
Removing all things that I feel ruined RuneScape
A few quests maybe?
Cleaning DeltaScape while in the process
Duel Arena (I always fail at it :()
Good pking
Economy based
Skills rely on each other
NPC clipping
Good combat base
More to come...
Pics:
Teleports requiring runes 4/18: [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development1.jpg[/img]
Teleports now require the correct magic level also 4/18: [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development2.jpg[/img]
Lumbridge NPC spawn and Lumbridge Guide 4/19: [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development3p1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development3p2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development3p3.jpg[/img]
If you have any suggestions, post them!
More info and pics coming soon...
Post may be inactive for a while - I'm grounded and sneak on.

item.title: Golden age of RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

SUGGESTION:

Import Object Definitions and NPC Definitions from PJA 459, i know, your using a 317, but you can still use the 459 XML documents. Also, after doing this, import some of the code from the 459 for clipping. After this, you should have some good clipping system on NPC’S.

Read full topic

item.title: Golden age of RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Budda:

Hundreds have set out to do this over the years these servers have been around, all of them failed, you will too.

Quoted for truth. Hopefully you are not thinking of a replica of RuneScape; something professional would suffice (e.g., low XP rates, fairly slow economy). Good luck with this anyway.

Read full topic

just a little comment, if you want to bring back the “golden days of runescape” (which I assume you mean client revision 317), then why are you using a client with a new UI? why not just use a ORIGINAL 317 client (with the cryption disabled if servers still require that?)?

item.title: Golden age of RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Updated: Now teleports require magic levels too. The problem before this was even if you did have the runes, but not the level it would still get rid of your runes. Now it’s perfected. I still need to add this to all of the other teleports.

Please keep this topic alive guys! It’s my motivation to keep working on this. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Golden age of RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Stay object oriented - meaning a lot more classes than there were as you first downloaded the server - and try to optimize & clean redundant code as well. You also might want to try a better packet handling system (you could use interfaces for each packet handled and then have a map). I don’t have anything else to say really so I tried to keep it short and sweet. I will be checking up on this thread for progress.

Read full topic
